required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, and Hemodynamic Response of PB1046 in Subjects With PAH
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label, Dose Titration Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, and Hemodynamic Response of PB1046, A Sustained-Release Analogue of Vasoactive Intestinal Peptide, In Adult Subjects With Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: PB1046-PT-CL-0005 is an open-label, dose-titration study to assess the safety, tolerability, and hemodynamic effects of individually dose-titrated PB1046 administered by weekly subcutaneous injection for 8 weeks in adult subjects with PAH who have a permanently implanted hemodynamic monitor in the distal pulmonary artery. The primary objectives of the study are to assess the overall safety, tolerability, and hemodynamic profile of a PB1046 across an individually titrated dose range.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose to 28 days after last dose
primary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of AEs (described descriptively) and their relationship to study drug

primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to eight weekly doses and 1 and 3 hours after the final dose and 1, 2, 3, 5, 7 and 28 days after final dose.
primary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline in blood pressure and their relationship to study drug

primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to eight weekly doses and 1 and 3 hours after the final dose and 1, 2, 3, 5, 7 and 28 days after final dose.
primary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline in heart rate and their relationship to study drug

primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and 7 and 28 days after last dose
primary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline in lipids and their relationship to study drug

primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and prior to doses 2-8 and 7 and 28 days after last dose
primary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline in serum chemistry and their relationship to study drug

primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and prior to doses 2-8 and 7 and 28 days after last dose
primary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline in urinalysis and their relationship to study drug

primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to doses 1-8 and 7 and 28 days after last dose

primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to eight weekly doses and 1 and 3 hours after the final dose and 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 8 and 28 days after final dose
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in mean pulmonary artery pressure

primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to eight weekly doses and 1 and 3 hours after the final dose and 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 8 and 28 days after final dose
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in cardiac index

primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to eight weekly doses and 1 and 3 hours after the final dose and 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 8 and 28 days after final dose
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in total pulmonary resistance

primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and 7 and 28 days after last dose
primary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline in fasting plasma glucose and their relationship to study drug

primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and prior to doses 2-8 and 7 and 28 days after last dose
primary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline in hematology and their relationship to study drug

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to eight weekly doses and at 1, 3, 24, 48, 72,120, 168 and 192 hours after final dose.
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the curve over the dosing interval (AUC(0-t))
